Key Match Events: Trent Boult took 96.21 points, the highest in the match
Lockie Ferguson took 3 wickets for 49 runs
Daryl Mitchell scored 89 runs off 67 balls with a strike rate of 132.83
Kane Williamson scored 78 runs but retired hurt
Post-Match Reflections: Daryl Mitchell and Glenn Phillips were not out, giving New Zealand a strong finish
Bangladesh's innings ended with 245/9 in 50 overs, with Mushfiqur Rahim scoring 66 runs not out
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand won by 8 wickets with 43 balls remaining
Bangladesh lost 9 wickets in the match
New Zealand's total was 248/2 in 42.5 overs
